reviewText: I ordered this by mistake. I thought I was ordering The Piano Guys, very entertaining musicians. That being said, I believe this video could be a lot of fun for someone wanting to learn to play Christmas songs on the piano. This is a different method. It just may be the right method for you.
I'm still trying to learn to play my piano.  This booklet is a life-saver ... and now for me to find the time to practice.
This is not what I expected I though he was going to teach some songs but he doesn't so I was sad :-(
Fun to add this to my piano guy collection
I was disappointed in this album because I don't play piano, but I gave it to a friend whose young grandson is very gifted and I thought would enjoy this.
its wasn't very helpful. the guy wasn't very good at teaching the person i bought the item for. and if i could i would get my money back.

This product was featured in the "People Also Bought" when I ordered a CD of "The Piano Guys" for my mother. The "Piano Guy" is not affiliated with the "Piano Guys" at all. Perhaps other people made the same mistake I did and assumed they were. The Piano Guys entertain, the Piano Guy teaches piano. This DVD may be a good tutorial, but my mother didn't want to learn how to play the piano, she wanted to see the Piano Guys playing.
We love the Piano Guys and this was just a great as all of their other works!  Looking forward to what they come out with next!

I thought this was a beautiful Christmas CD. Didn't realize it is a teaching DVD.
Am disappointed that this wasn't advertised better.
I ordered this and it lived up to every expectation - was a gift, but I got to listen to it, too!
